title: Rabbinical Courts Get New Power
body: Israeli lawmakers Moshe Gafni and Yisrael Eichler's bill to let Israelis settle monetary disputes in state-recognized rabbinical courts advances in the Knesset.

title: New York Islamist Threat
body: New York state assemblyman Zohran Mamdani's mayoral win may unleash seismic change in America, with expected policy failures potentially devastating the city, writes Melanie Phillips.
